definitions.definition: The process or manner of treating someone or something.
definitions.example: He still has nightmares resulting from the treatment he received from his captors.

definitions.definition: Medical care for an illness or injury.
definitions.example: A treatment or cure is applied after a medical problem has already started.

definitions.definition: The use of a substance or process to preserve or give particular properties to something.
A treatise; a formal written description or characterization of a subject.
A brief, third-person, present-tense summary of a proposed film.
